entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Graphical objects should be drawn from Righ To Left when FlowDirection is RightToLeft #14038
  • RegisterForActivityResult does not work #14037
  • canvas.DrawImage from originally CVPixelBuffer is not visible #14034
  • Remove solution files from maui templates #14033
  • User Story: As a developer I have an efficient inner loop building .NET MAUI apps #14032
    .NET 8
  • User Story: As a developer I can build apps with Xcode 15 and .NET 8 #14030
    .NET 8
  • User Story: As a developer I can build apps with Xcode 14.x and .NET 8 #14029
    .NET 8
  • User Story: As a developer I can use up-to-date versions of AndroidX and GPS in .NET 8 #14028
    .NET 8
  • TableSection TextColor NullReferenceException in Mac #14027
  • User Story: As a developer I can build applications with Android API 34 #14026
    .NET 8
  • [Windows] Semantic hint not announced from Stepper #14023
  • Epic: Features for creating excellent desktop user experiences #14022
    .NET 8
  • As a desktop developer I can support advanced keyboard interactions #14021
    .NET 8
  • Epic: .NET MAUI developers are successful in ensuring the quality of their applications #14019
    .NET 8
  • Epic: Mobile developers can leverage the latest platform SDKs and libraries with .NET #14018
    .NET 8
  • MAUI template does not available on visual studio 2022 for mac #14017
  • User Story: Xamarin developers are successful using .NET Upgrade Assistant #14016
    .NET 8
  • Epic: Xamarin developers are able to upgrade their projects to .NET 8 #14015
    .NET 8
  • Theme: Delight developers building client and mobile applications with .NET 8 #14014
    .NET 8
  • Deploying to iOS crashes with System.IO.FileNotFoundException #14011
  • Easy way to get Color from Colors.xaml #14007
  • Add IsVisible property to Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Cell #14004
    Backlog
  • 在Resources设置Label的VerticalTextAlignment属性导致程序崩溃,报错Value does not fall within the expected range. #14003
  • MAUI Template not showing up in VS 17.5.2 #14001
  • OnNavigatedTo is not called when navigating from a specific page #14000

Closed

  • Shapes on Android don't support Horizontal/VerticalOptions #9433
    Backlog
  • Entry and Switch in a Grid #6292
    Backlog
  • Simplification of interface declaration in code #12678
    Backlog
  • Maui app as exe crashed after 6 hours of running #12593
    Backlog
  • Add guide how to connect to any service hosted at localhost from real device connected through Visual Studio #8379
  • Build and deploy for windows target in CLI #7678
  • Picker width on Windows not filling container #6391
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Keyboard covers the entry #4792
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Bug] a11y inconsistencies on StackLayout w/ semantics #1268
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Radiobutton with ControlTemplate doesn't recognize Click Event Correctly #6938
    Backlog
  • Setting ScrollView.Orientation has no effect on iOS #13412
    Backlog
  • Elements in ColumnDefinition with star width are not displayed when the Grid is in a StackLayout #13993

PullRequests

Created

  • Use a layout for MauiButton on Windows which supports LineBreakMode #14036
  • [vs-workload] Remove @(MultiTargetPackNames) #14031
  • [Android] Avoid to clip the SwipeView to the outline if the SwipeView or the Content has shadow #14024
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-swipeview
  • [net7.0] Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #14020
  • [net8.0] Update extensions versions #14010
    area/upstream, dependencies
  • Add TitleView to VisualChildren list for Page/Shell #14006

Merged

  • [net7.0] Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus (#13908) #14012
    area/controls 🎮
  • Merge main into net8.0 #14025
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Fix Picker alignment issues #13516
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • [net7.0] Cast to a less derived type on TabbedPageManager (#13689) #13998
    area/TabbedPage
  • [iOS] Scroll with the keyboard to not block entries and editors #13499
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview, keyboard
  • [controls] fix cases a GC causes events to not fire #13997
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Android] Fix Frame Renderer to use Wrapper View correctly #12218
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [iOS] Implement ScrollView Orientation #13657
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎, layout-scrollview
  • Ensure that Grid is treating star rows/columns as Auto when unconstrained #13999
    area/layout 🔲, backport/suggested
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #13908
    area/controls 🎮, keyboard, backport/approved
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #14009
  • [Windows] Fix Button sizing issues using HorizontalOptions #14005
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Fixed dupe items in ShellView #13987
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/shell 🐢
  • Reinstate WebView cookie functionality for Android & iOS #13736
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Removed Duplicate code in RadioButton.Tizen #13996
    area/controls 🎮, platform/tizen, partner/tizen
  • Bump NUnit3TestAdapter from 4.3.1 to 4.4.2 #13983
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.2.230217.4 to 1.2.230313.1 #13984
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Code Style] Add some extra style checks focused on nullability. #14002
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Refactor keyboard focus code for .NET 8 #13824
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix iOS ListView Footer Missing (#13560) #13744
    community ✨, area/ListView
  • Fix memory leak in VisualElement.Shadow #13960
    t/bug, area/perf 🏎️
  • [controls] fix memory leaks in `Page` & navigation #13833
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Essentials] Remove Task.Run from SecureStorage #13940
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Bump WASDK and BuildTools #13687
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Implement SearchBar CancelButtonColor on Windows #13622
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Fix iOS ListView cell gone hidden (#11287) #13669
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/ListView
  • Invalidate shapes changing any property inside the brushes (Fill, Stroke) #13905
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
